entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
